label.author: Author
label.heading: Heading
label.sharedWith: Enter a new email and press Enter
label.sharedWithDuplicate: This email has already been added.
label.drawToolDescription: Draw on the map, download the drawn data as a file, and then import it into your story.
label.imageUpload: Upload an image for the story logo
label.removeLogoImage: Remove the image for the story logo
label.wmsHint: You can paste either the base WMS service URL or a full GetCapabilities URL.

dashboardView.title: Data Narrator
dashboardView.subtitle: Find and create data stories for Hamburg!
dashboardView.description: With the Urban Data Narrator (DaNa), you can read, create, and share data stories based on the Hamburg Geoportal. These data stories tell about many different topics and places in Hamburg. Selected data from the Hamburg Geoportal is combined with texts, photos, and illustrations. This way, you can share your perspective on urban development topics backed by data. DaNa is a project of the City Science Lab at HafenCity University Hamburg and is implemented as part of the Connected Urban Twins project.

success.storyShared: The story URL has been copied to the clipboard.

warning.mapMoved: Some values do not match the current map view.
warning.sendNoSteps: Submitting a story is only possible when a step/chapter has been added.
warning.sendNoHTML: Submitting a subchapter is only possible once content has been added.
warning.storyNotSaved: Your story could not be saved.
warning.noIntervalOnScrolly: Scrollable stories cannot have an autoplay interval.
warning.noStepInChapter: Chapters must contain at least one step.

error.chapterNumberAlreadyExists: A chapter with this number already exists. Please choose another number.
error.stepNumberAlreadyExists: A step with this number already exists. Please choose another number.
error.errorAddingImage: The image could not be loaded. Please try another file.

closeStoryCreation.title: Close Tool
closeStoryCreation.description: Are you sure you want to close the tool? Entered data will not be saved.

deleteStep.title: Delete Step
deleteStep.description: Are you sure you want to delete this step? This cannot be undone.

deleteStory.title: Delete Story
deleteStory.description: Are you sure you want to delete this story? This cannot be undone.

createStoryDataProtectionNotice.title: Accept Privacy Policy
createStoryDataProtectionNotice.description: By continuing, you agree to our {termsOfUseLink}. Please read it carefully to understand how we use and protect your data.

leaveWithoutSaving.title: Leave without Saving?
leaveWithoutSaving.description: You have unsaved changes in this story. If you go back now, your progress will be lost. Do you want to continue?

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.text: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone. Deleting your account will permanently remove all your data, including your stories, settings, and personal information. Please note that this action is irreversible.
deleteAccount.confirmPrompt: To confirm, please enter your username: {{username}}
deleteAccount.error: An error occurred while deleting the account.
